title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 3 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 3 2021
description:
Reveling in the glory of a gubernatorial upset and how mamma bears went full Grizzly at the polls. Florida Senator Marco Rubio weighs in on the VA election victory and gives an update on the forgotten story of Cuba. Woke liberals react to yesterday’s defeat with cries of racism. And Arizona Congressman Andy Biggs predicts the Dems will double down after the VA defeat and why what's going on at the border matters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
